posts.content:
Hi Guys,
So I've had another urge for a project and this time it's converting my 67 Crewcab into a mobile coffee van.

I've done quite a bit of research into it and know all the equipment/ costs involved, the only thing I've struggled with is finding places to trade.

To start with quite a few places are managed and organise their own catering and secondly at other events the trading prices are so high!

Has anyone got any experience of trading at events? Or any show managers that are looking for traders?

Thanks in advance!
